interestingFact: India is the world's largest democracy and home to the ancient Indus Valley Civilization.
Nepal is home to Mount Everest, the tallest mountain in the world at 8,848 meters.
The Pyramids of Giza are one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.
Australia is home to the Great Barrier Reef, the largest coral reef system in the world.
Brazil contains the Amazon Rainforest, the largest tropical rainforest in the world.
The Eiffel Tower in Paris was once the tallest man-made structure in the world.
Russia is the largest country in the world by area, covering more than 17 million square kilometers.
The Great Wall of China stretches over 21,000 kilometers and can be seen from space under certain conditions.
